mapper.select: SELECT comment.id, comment.user_id, user.nickname, board.id, comment.body, comment.is_anonymous, comment.created_at, comment.like_cnt, IFNULL(comment_like.comment_id, 0) FROM comment JOIN board ON board.id = comment.board_id JOIN user ON comment.user_id = user.id LEFT OUTER JOIN comment_like ON comment.id = comment_like.comment_id and comment_like.user_id = #{userId} WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND comment.state = 0
